com.stormpath.shiro.realm

Interface AccountPermissionResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountCustomDataPermissionResolver

    public interface AccountPermissionResolver
    An AccountPermissionResolver inspects a Stormpath Account and returns that Account's directly assigned Permissions.

    Note that this interface is for resolving permissions that are directly assigned to an Account. Permissions that are assigned to an account's groups (and therefore implicitly associated with an Account), would be resolved instead by a GroupPermissionResolver instance instead.

    Shiro checks these permissions (in addition to any assigned groups' permissions) to determine whether or not a Subject representing the Account isPermitted to do something.

    Since:
    0.3
    See Also:
    GroupPermissionResolver

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<org.apache.shiro.authz.Permission> resolvePermissions(com.stormpath.sdk.account.Account account)
      Returns a set of Permissions assigned to a particular Stormpath Account.

    • Method Detail

      • resolvePermissions

        Set<org.apache.shiro.authz.Permission> resolvePermissions(com.stormpath.sdk.account.Account account)
        Returns a set of Permissions assigned to a particular Stormpath Account.

        Note that method is for resolving permissions that are directly assigned to an Account. Permissions that are assigned to an account's groups (and therefore implicitly associated with an Account), would be resolved instead by a GroupPermissionResolver instance.

        Shiro checks these permissions to determine whether or not a Subject representing the Account isPermitted to do something.

        Parameters:
        account - the Stormpath Account to inspect to return its directly assigned Shiro Permissions.
        Returns:
        a set of Shiro Permissions assigned to the account, to be used by Shiro for runtime permission checks.
        See Also:
        GroupPermissionResolver
